    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage mainStage, java.util.ArrayList<User> users, int userIndex, int albumIndex) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Creates a table which is empty or with what ever picture that is added into it already. Storing data into the array list
      Parameters:
      mainStage - the stage which is selected
      users - The user list
      userIndex - the current user index from the users
      albumIndex - the current album index
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
